about_the_game:
Sollarion is a turn-based strategy that combines a collectible card game and a 3D strategy genre.

Players summon units and cast spells using their pre-built deck. Summoned units can be moved around the board and attack enemy units and structures.
By positioning units on a hexagonal map, players can choose multiple approaches to the game and create various advanced tactics with more possibilities than in other cards-based strategies.

It is necessary to occupy resource tiles and build mines there to play more powerful cards. There are also other special effect tiles on the board that expand the range of possible play styles. Each player will find their own winning strategy.
The player who destroys his enemy's portal wins.

Map terrain and tile layout are different in every match, making Sollarion less repetitive, more complex and more entertaining.




Forge is a unique game mechanic that allows players to change their current cards into new ones by modifying the stat or abilities of the cards.

You have a chance to select one of the three factions. You'll earn unique skins and rewards from faction quests or tournaments.



Build your army and head into battle for the Sollarion Crystal. There will be more than 1000 cards ready for you to customize according to your preferences.

You can learn from the cards, how far can you move, how powerful your card is and how many attacks it can take.

Cards are also divided by rarity and quality and some of them have abilities, whether passive or active, which can greatly affect the battle.




In the past, humans were forced to leave the planet Earth, because they underestimated the warning sings it was giving them. On their long juorney through space, they discovered a new galaxy that offered them a second chance.

Join the humans in finding a new home in the Rya Galaxy! On this journey, you'll discover new planets, races and cultures and learn the secrets this galaxy hides.
